Class FlyBoardNormal

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.FlyBoard
org.mio.progettoingsoft.model.FlyBoardNormal
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlyBoardServer
public class FlyBoardNormal extends FlyBoard
Represents the normal mode game board (FlyBoard) in the game. This class extends FlyBoard and implements specific logic for the normal game mode, including the management of an hourglass, circuit creation, and loading of sealed adventure cards.

  • Method Details

    • indexToPosition

      public static int indexToPosition(int index)
      Converts an internal circuit index to a player position on the visual circuit. This mapping is specific to the normal game mode's visual representation.
      Parameters:
      index - The internal index in the circuit list.
      Returns:
      The corresponding visual position, or 0 if the index is incorrect.

    • positionToIndex

      public static int positionToIndex(int position)
      Converts a player's position on the visual circuit to an internal circuit index. This mapping is specific to the normal game mode's visual representation.
      Parameters:
      position - The visual position on the circuit.
      Returns:
      The corresponding internal index, or -1 if the position is incorrect.

    • startHourglass

      public void startHourglass(int idGame)
      Starts or restarts the hourglass timer for the current game. If it's the first use, a new Hourglass instance is created.
      Specified by:
      startHourglass in class FlyBoard
      Parameters:
      idGame - The ID of the ongoing game to which this hourglass belongs.

    • buildLittleDecks

      protected void buildLittleDecks()
      Builds the "little decks" of adventure cards, distributing level 1 and level 2 cards into three separate decks. This is specific to the normal game mode's card distribution.
      Specified by:
      buildLittleDecks in class FlyBoard

    • setLittleDecks

      public void setLittleDecks(List<List<Integer>> decks)
      Sets the "little decks" for the game. This method creates a deep copy of the provided decks to ensure immutability.
      Specified by:
      setLittleDecks in class FlyBoard
      Parameters:
      decks - A List of List of Integers, where each inner list represents a little deck of card IDs.

    • getLittleDecks

      public List<List<Integer>> getLittleDecks()

      Specified by:

      Returns:
      A List of List of Integers, representing the little decks.

    • loadSldAdvCard

      protected Map<Integer,SldAdvCard> loadSldAdvCard()
      Loads sealed adventure cards from a JSON resource file ("advCards.json"). It parses the JSON and creates appropriate SldAdvCard objects based on their "type" field.
      Specified by:
      loadSldAdvCard in class FlyBoard
      Returns:
      A Map where the key is the card ID and the value is the corresponding SldAdvCard object.

    • getBuiltShip

      public ShipBoard getBuiltShip(HousingColor color)
      Retrieves a ShipBoardNormal instance built according to the specified HousingColor. This method is synchronized to ensure thread-safe ship creation.
      Specified by:
      getBuiltShip in class FlyBoard
      Parameters:
      color - The HousingColor of the ship to build (RED, YELLOW, GREEN, or BLUE).
      Returns:
      The built ShipBoardNormal instance, or null if the color is not recognized.
